uvi.product_version: versions from v4.9 to before v5.13.5
uvi.description:
net: qcom/emac: fix UAF in emac_remove

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.13.5 by commit 8a225a6e07a57a1538d53637cb3d82bd3e477839, it was introduced in version v4.9 by commit 54e19bc74f3380d414681762ceed9f7245bc6a6e. For more details please see the references link.
